tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE system_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_date DATE,
    system_performance DECIMAL,
    alerts_count INT,
    incidents_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE system_performance_reports (
   report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   report_date DATE,
   report_type VARCHAR(50),
   system_name VARCHAR(50),
   performance_metrics JSON
);

CREATE TABLE alerts_and_incidents (
   alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   alert_date TIMESTAMP,
   alert_type VARCHAR(50),
   incident_category VARCHAR(50),
   details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title VARCHAR,
  report_date DATE,
  performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type VARCHAR,
  alert_date DATE,
  alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  id UUID,
  system_id UUID,
  alert_type VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
  id UUID,
  system_id UUID,
  incident_type VARCHAR,
  details JSON,
  reported_by VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Review (
  id UUID,
  incident_id UUID,
  reviewer VARCHAR,
  review_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE SystemPerformanceReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  performance_metric FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE AlertLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_type TEXT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  user_email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SystemUsers (
  user_id INT,
  system_role TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
)
